name: Google Material Rounded
description: Rounds buttons, text inputs and other elements of the UI, mantaining the "Google Search" and "I'm Feeling Lucky" buttons.
additional_info: 2.3 - Search button colors changed - Log in button color changed 2.2 - Rounded color image selection - Height of tags in image search reduced 2.1 - Improved Google site detection - Updated classes and ids - Adapted to new Google UI - Added rounded corners to GApps - Added Google Sans font to some elements of the UI.
